author: Andrew J. Bacevich
title: Captain Crozier Was Right, And His Sailors Knew It
description: He put Men before the Mission. That the brass removed him and killed his Navy career calls into question their own judgment. The post Captain Crozier Was Right, And His Sailors Knew It appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: He put Men before the Mission. That the brass removed him and killed his Navy career calls into question their own judgment. As a fledgling officer long, long ago, I was taught to abide by the hierarchy of Mission first, then Men, and then Self. Simple enough… [+4174 chars]
